summary: A young girl leaves her home on Mars with a dream to be a space pilot. Once in the capital, Nono meets top pilot Lal'C during a space monster attack, and joins the Solar Defense Force. ... See full summary »
cast: Yukari Fukui|Maaya Sakamoto|Miyuki Sawashiro|Mitsuo Iwata|Takumi Yamazaki|Sanae Kobayashi|Yuki Matsuoka|Nozomu Sasaki|Yûko Kaida|Akio Suyama|Satoshi Gotô|Yoko Honna|Katsunosuke Hori|Shirô Ishimoda|Shizuka Itô|Masayuki Katô|Takafumi Kawakami|Shigeru Kawakubo|Kôichi Kitamura|Motomu Kiyokawa|Kei Kobayashi|Yû Kobayashi|Takashi Kondô|Mami Koyama|Dai Matsumoto|Hitomi Nabatame|Haruhi Nanao|Masayuki Omoro|Daisuke Ono|Kôichi Sakaguchi|Tomoyuki Shimura|Yoshinori Sonobe|Takuma Suzuki|Gara Takashima|Hiroki Touchi|Hideyuki Umezu|Akino Watanabe|Kazuko Yanaga|Hiroshi Yanaka|Ryôka Yuzuki|Ryûnosuke Ôbayashi
title: Top wo Nerae 2!
